# UITableViewRowAction.Style

**Enumeration**

Constants that specify the appearance of action buttons.

## Declaration

```swift
enum Style
```

## Styles

- **UITableViewRowAction.Style.default**: Apply the default style to the button.
- **destructive**: Equal to the default style.
- **UITableViewRowAction.Style.normal**: Apply a style that reflects standard non-destructive actions.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Configuring the action’s appearance

- **style**: The style applied to the action button.
- **title**: The title of the action button.
- **backgroundColor**: The background color of the action button.
- **backgroundEffect**: The visual effect to apply to the button.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
